Research

A Case for Reform of the Child Welfare System. Miriam Aroni Krinsky. Family Court Review, 45 (4), 541–547 (2007).

Child Maltreatment and Foster Care: Unpacking the Effects of Prenatal and Postnatal Parental Substance Use. Dana K. Smith; Amber B. Johnson; Katherine C. Pears; Philip A. Fisher; David S. DeGarmo. Child Maltreatment, Vol. 12, No. 2, 150-160 (2007).

Public Websites

Child Welfare Resource Center. The CWRC has exceptional prevention materials that align with my child studies. They provide excellent techniques and ample research data to validate them.
